snippet.title: RPG Chess - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist RPG Chess on Steam👇
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3383450/RPG_Chess/

RPG Chess is a turn-based RPG, except it's also chess! Instead of simply capturing the pieces, your pieces engage in thrilling 1v1 battles where they can gain experience, level up, and unlock powerful abilities. Shape your team as you progress through the single-player campaign or challenge others in online matches!♟️⚔️
